entities.name: SAFE
entities.description: SAFE is responsible for granting necessary approvals for the Plan related to shares of Common Stock.

entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is responsible for determining and obtaining the necessary approvals for the Plan and issuing shares of Common Stock.

entities.name: DESIGNATED BROKER
entities.description: The designated broker is authorized by the Company to assist with the sale of shares of Common Stock on behalf of the participant.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company must obtain necessary approvals from SAFE for the Plan related to shares of Common Stock.
The Company authorizes the designated broker to assist with the sale of shares of Common Stock on behalf of the participant.
